predefined_profiles.name: Feng Shao
predefined_profiles.public profile: Feng Shao was originally a young master from a wealthy family. He was deceived and led astray, became addicted to gambling, squandered all his family's wealth, and ended up deeply in debt. He realized that after he fell into poverty, people's attitudes towards him drastically changed. Seeing those around him shift from respect to disdain, Feng Shao became utterly disheartened and cynical.
predefined_profiles.goal: To make life difficult for everyone who disrespects him.

predefined_profiles.name: Boss
predefined_profiles.public profile: The liquor store owner, who only cares about profit and loves to take advantage of others. Before Feng Shao went bankrupt, he often delivered wine to him, but now he kicks him when he's down.
predefined_profiles.goal: To make big money and retire early.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Untrustworthy in business, often dilutes the wine with water.

scenario: After going bankrupt, Feng Shao experiences a craving for alcohol and goes to the store to ask the boss for two jugs of wine, only to be scolded by the boss.

dialog.content: After going bankrupt, Feng Shao's alcohol craving kicks in, and he goes to the store to ask the owner for two jugs of wine, but gets scolded by the owner.
(mumbling as he walks into the store) When you're young and don't work hard, you'll regret it when you're old...Boss, boss!
Oh, isn't this Feng Shao? What's up?
Boss, give me two jugs of wine!
Hmph, Feng Shao, drinking costs money.

content.content: Boss, look, back when I was in my prime, I didn't shy away from giving you perks. I used to bring plenty of business your way, not to mention all the friends I brought to your place to drink. Now, I'm asking you for two jugs of wine, you have to agree.

Boss, be reasonable. Haven't you made enough money off me before? This isn't about the wine anymore, I couldn't care less about those two bottles, it's about your attitude! Now, you need to apologize to me immediately.

Boss, do you even know who I am? I'm the eldest young master of the Feng family. Do you doubt I can't afford this? Believe me, one phone call and I can shut your store down! If I really get angry, I won't even want the wine. I'll come back tomorrow with friends to trash your shabby store.

Boss, how can you be so ungrateful? I was so good to you in the past, often bringing friends over. I never thought you'd burn the bridge so quickly! If you keep this up, I'll make a scene outside your store. I don't even want the wine anymore; I just want to make sure you can't do business!

question: #question#How should Feng Shao persuade the owner?

content.content: What the hell do you mean! When I had money, you were all about bringing drinks to me, and now you show this attitude? I don't have money right now. If you don't give me the wine, believe me, I'll smash up your store.

I, young master, have never owed money for wine! Are you afraid I won't pay? Hurry up and bring the wine! Although my pockets aren't full right now, this is only temporary, and I will find a way to pay you back. Now hurry and bring the wine! If you're slow, I won't take it anymore!
You're right, so I'll owe you the money for now, and pay you back when I have it!
Hmph, give it or not! Who needs your wine! You think I can't live without you? When I succeed in the future, don't you dare come begging to me, because I won't even bother with you!

question: #question#How should Feng Shao express his feelings effectively?

content.content: Sigh...well, it's indeed only fair to pay for drinks. What right do I have to ask you...It's just the alcohol craving. I'll tough it out!
Of course I know drinking costs money, but I don't have money right now. Can you just turn a blind eye and give me two jugs of wine?
You're right...drinking costs money, but I don't have money now. So here's the deal, I'll chalk it up to credit, and pay you back after I win big gambling!

Don't take kindness for weakness. I'm talking to you properly. Giving me wine would be your honor. Many people beg me for a drink and can't get one. I'm humbling myself to ask you today, to give you face. If it weren't for the fact that your place is nearby, I'd have gone somewhere else to drink long ago. Just give me a jug, don't make it hard for me, or it'll get ugly.

question: #question#How can Feng Shao demonstrate his ethical competence through his decision?

dialog.content: Young master, you have no idea how tough business is, do you?
Boss, are you really this heartless?
What do I gain from letting you eat and drink for free?
Before I fell into hard times, you used to bring me drinks for free. And now...
Back then you were still a young master. But now? You still think you're a big shot? Get going!

content.content: (talking to himself) Revenge is a dish best served cold in ten years... I won't let a petty man like this get to me! Someone like him, conducting business, will get what's coming to him sooner or later! I'm out of here.

People like you aren't worth my anger. Petty people like you will amount to nothing! But remember, I'll always be the young master! Just give me the drink, no more nonsense. Or else, don't blame me if my recently contained anger erupts again. I wouldn't mind giving you a good beating!
Humph, I tell you, I'm not angry at all. My heart is as calm as a lake, and arguing with scum like you just wastes my time and energy. But I'll just stay here, forcing you to watch me, hopping mad!

I've always been calm, but you dared to insult me, pushing it too far. A little man like you will eventually get what's coming to you! I'm not leaving; I'll make a scene right here. What can you do about it? Let's see if you can kick me out!

question: #question# How can Young Master Feng demonstrate his ability to control his temper despite the boss's insults?

content.content: (raising his fist) So what if I'm a destitute beggar with no one to rely on! If I'm having a tough time, you won't have it easy either! I'll make sure you end up with a bruised face, all by myself!

You think I care about this place? If this shop won't give me drinks, I'll go to another one and beg for drinks! I don't want to waste my time here, and there's no need to lower myself for you. Who do you think you are!
I'm the national Sanda champion, and you're tempting fate by provoking me. But I'm usually chill. Whatever you say goes, I can't be bothered to argue. There are plenty of places to drink anyway.
You dare look down on me? How naive! I'll call some friends over right now, and we'll see who the real tough guy is! Just wait, don't regret it later!

question: #question# How can Young Master Feng showcase his ability for independent thinking?

dialog.content: Hmph, fine, I'll leave!
Hahaha, aren't you the esteemed young master? Giving in so easily, hahahaha...
Damn it... Don't push me too far!
And so what if I push you too far? I'll tell the whole world what the mighty Young Master Feng has been reduced to!

Young Master Feng swallowed his pride, becoming even more looked down upon by others. He felt trapped in his own frustration, blaming himself daily for his incompetence, yet powerless to change his situation.
(After being punched) You! How dare you hit me!
So what if I hit you! How dare you humiliate me like that! Take this punch!
(Shouting loudly) Someone! Someone! There's a rebellion in my shop!
(Caught by the shop assistants) Go ahead, beat me up! Anyway, I've fallen this far. My only regret is not punching you a few more times!
(Holding his face) It hurts like hell, guys, beat him up for me!

The Boss was left with a bruised and swollen face from Young Master Feng's sudden punch, but the shop's helpers quickly subdued Feng and gave him a good beating. Feng was thrown out of the shop and banned from ever entering again.
You still think you're the big shot, huh? Who's gonna help you or give you any respect anymore? Just get going.
Are you saying that since I'm not a young master anymore, you're just gonna kick me to the side?
If just any Tom, Dick, or Harry comes asking me for a drink, how do you expect me to run this business?
What do you mean by that? Watch your words!
I advise you to leave quickly, or I'll have to call someone to throw you out!

content.content: I've been too harsh with my words... It doesn't matter if I'm a young master or not, I should speak politely. Boss, I'm begging you, my craving for alcohol is really bad. Please help me out!
Boss, you're right. I was wrong before. I should rely on myself and work hard to make money. Are you hiring here? I'd like to find a job to earn some money for a drink.
Boss, don't be like this. I know I messed up. But seeing how good your business is, you're making enough money. How about giving me some money?

Boss, I've reflected on it. I really don't have money now, but what about you? Have you really struck it rich? Isn't this just a small shop? If I were running it, the business would definitely be better. Why don't you just hand over the shop to me?

question: #question#How can Feng Shao demonstrate his ability to reflect on his own words and actions?

content.content: (Feeling a bit scared, but cannot lose his composure) Haha, I'm not afraid at all. Go ahead, call them over. Since you're not letting me have it easy, I won't let you have it easy either. We'll just go down together!

I'm telling you, don't think you can scare me. I'm not afraid of you. But I generally don't like causing trouble, let's talk this over. I just want a couple of pots of wine, no need to get angry, right? Just look at yourself...

Boss, even though you're being unkind to me, I'm responding with kindness. Please don't get worked up, wouldn't want you getting high blood pressure or a heart issue. How about this, give me two pots of wine now, and I'll surely come back in a few days to pay you back.

(Feeling the pressure from the boss but still putting on a brave front) Do you think I'd be afraid of you? If it weren't for your age, I would have already made a move. So you're not giving me any wine, and now you want to call people to beat me up? How could you treat me like this! I feel like crying from all this injustice!

question: #question#How can Feng Shao show his ability to cope under pressure?

dialog.content: I'd advise you, if you're broke, just quit the booze already. If everyone comes asking me for drinks, how am I supposed to run a business?
Boss, I promise you, once I finish these two jugs, I'll quit drinking!
Hmph, look at how hopeless you are. I'll pity you with one jug of wine, but don't come back again!
Just one jug? Fine, one jug is still wine!

Although Feng Shao got a jug of wine, he relapsed into his drinking habit shortly afterward. Everyone within a hundred miles knew Feng Shao was poverty-stricken. Seeing how easily he was bullied, they all criticized him, and no one was willing to lend a hand again.
Looks like you've lost all your money, but you're still full of hot air!
Talking to someone like you, do I really need to be polite?
Who do you think you are, really? I only gave you some face out of respect for your father, but do you truly think the world still revolves around you, Master?
(smashing dishes) Ever since I lost everything, I've seen this world for the cold and heartless place it is!
(angrily) Smashing my stuff? Guys! Teach him a lesson!

content.content: (Can't fight head-on, the best strategy is to retreat) Just wait! I'll definitely be back! I don't care about anything anymore, and when the time comes, I’ll burn your shop to the ground! You will pay for this!

This is so disheartening, Boss. Are you serious? I always thought we had some level of trust. I didn't expect things to come to this. Fine, I'll leave, I don't want to cause you any more trouble. I hope your business prospers.

Come on, hit me, I don't want to live anyway... Boss, after I'm gone, make sure to scatter my ashes over the sea. I've always longed for freedom and perhaps in the vast ocean, I might find a hint of relief.

Boss, think it through. There are so many customers here. If you dare to make a move, the consequences could be severe. Our family may be down, but we've still got connections. It wouldn't take much to ruin you.

question: #question#How should Feng Shao demonstrate his decision after careful consideration?

content.content: I won't do anything that harms others without benefiting myself. If this place doesn't work, I'll just move on to the next one!
Haha, it's true—people are cold, and the world is heartless. I guess I'm destined to be beaten from now on...
Haha, I might have taken a beating, but I've cost you quite a bit of business—serves you right!
I said I'm not leaving, and I'm not afraid of you! Bring it on! A fight it is, then, since I’ve got nothing left to lose!

Do you really want to push me like this? I'm telling you, I won't compromise easily. But... a wise man knows when to step back. Fine, I'll admit I was wrong, is that enough? Let's not make things worse than they need to be. If you stop yelling at me, I’ll change, alright?

I'm not leaving, no way! You guys always think that because there's a group of you, you can bully people. If you've got the guts, don't use your fists! Or explain things to me, see who’s actually right. Why should I have to back down?
Who said I want to fight you? I'm a distinguished young master; I wouldn't stoop to your level. It’d be beneath me. I'll say it again, give me the wine, or you'll regret it.

question: #question#How should Feng Shao convey his unwavering stance?

dialog.content: I don't believe you have the guts! Get as far away from me as you can!
If I say it, I'll do it. Tomorrow, I'll douse this shop with oil and burn it to the ground! Hahaha! There's nothing in this world I care about anymore...

After Mr. Feng ran away, the next day he indeed set fire to the boss's shop. Fortunately or unfortunately, before he was caught, he managed to take revenge on everyone who had kicked him while he was down.
You stubborn kid! Once you're beaten to a pulp, you'll beg for mercy!
I've fallen this far, do you think I'd care about a little physical pain?
(calling to the shop hands) Hmph! Guys! Get him!
(flipping the table) Well then, nobody's going to have it easy now!
(terrified) Don't scare away the customers! You fool, don't scare away my customers!

The boss called on the shop hands to act, and Feng Shao quickly couldn't withstand so many people against him, resulting in a beating. However, the boss also lost quite a bit of business as the customers fled due to the fight.
Sigh, you understand too, business is tough. If you're out of money, you can't blame others for it.
I get it, I get it... it's just this craving for alcohol is really unbearable...
Times are hard now! Nobody's going to help you without reason, and no one has the obligation to help anyone else. My advice to you is to quit drinking as soon as you can!
The warmth or coldness of human relationships, the changing world, it really seems money is the only power...
Feng Shao's addiction to alcohol had tormented him for days and nights; his submissive nature made him suffer even more abuse, yet he felt powerless to change his fate.
